links.*: The Ring Goes Ever On: Proceedings of the Tolkien 2005 Conference

wikitext.*:
Dr. '''Richard Sturch''' is an Anglican priest, the Secretary of the [http://www.charleswilliamssociety.org.uk/index.html Charles Williams Society], and also active in [[The Tolkien Society]]. He wrote several essays and books about [[Christianity]] and the [[Inklings]]. 

==Bilbiography==
===Books===
*[[2001]]: [[Cormarë]] 3: ''[[Four Christian Fantasists]]''

===Articles===
*[[1979]]: [[Amon Hen 38|''Amon Hen'' 38]]
**"The [[Glorfindel]] Question"
*[[1979]]: [[Amon Hen 41|''Amon Hen'' 41]]
**"The Last Living Memory"
*[[1980]]: [[Amon Hen 46|''Amon Hen'' 46]]
** "Of Orcs and Other Oddities"
*[[2008]]: ''[[The Ring Goes Ever On: Proceedings of the Tolkien 2005 Conference]]''
**"On Tolkien, and Williams, and Tolkien on Williams"
*[[2012]]: ''VATES - The Journal of New Latin Poetry''
**"2 Songs from Erus Anulorum"

===Booklet===
*[[2014]]: ''Pars Prima Anuli Sodalitas''
**"J.R.R. Tolkien ex Anglico sermone in Latinum conversa a Ricardo Stuch"
